configuration.script:
val mqttActions = getActions("mqtt","mqtt:broker:cc36b964a4")
var diseases = Thing_Generica_MQTT_Diseases_channel.state.toString
diseases = diseases.replaceAll("\"highPressure\":false", "\"highPressure\":true")

logWarn("diseases", "Turning on HIGH PRESSURE: {}", diseases)
mqttActions.publishMQTT("diseases",diseases, true)

configuration.script:
val mqttActions = getActions("mqtt","mqtt:broker:cc36b964a4")
var diseases = Thing_Generica_MQTT_Diseases_channel.state.toString
diseases = diseases.replaceAll("\"fever\":true", "\"fever\":false")

logWarn("diseases", "Turning off FEVER: {}", diseases)
mqttActions.publishMQTT("diseases",diseases, true)

diseases = diseases.replaceAll("\"fever\":false", "\"fever\":true")

logWarn("diseases", "Turning on FEVER: {}", diseases)
mqttActions.publishMQTT("diseases",diseases, true)
